original_title: What the Gaza blockade looks like through the eyes of Egyptian truck drivers and aid workers | CNN
article_summary: Egyptian truck drivers face long delays, Israeli rejections, and harsh border conditions while delivering aid to Gaza, causing financial hardship and frustration. Thousands of trucks carrying aid are waiting on the Egyptian side, with 5,000 trucks reportedly stuck, according to the Egyptian Foreign Minister. Despite the difficulties, drivers continue to deliver aid due to the dire need in Gaza.</s>
